summary:
THE ORIGINAL LONG-RANGE ATTRACTANT! - Bone Collector Blend is an amazing attraction with three irresistible grains with the special aromas Big&J® is known for. In this era of food plots and property management, deer will choose to go to the setup that’s best. Bone Collector Blend is your secret weapon.
